column2: "Guardian! Welcome back! What have you to report on the meaning of Christmas?"

"Three key words, you say?
\"Presents\", \"Love\" and \"Feasting\"...
I see, I believe I understand now."

"Three key words, you say?
\"Presents\", \"Love\" and \"Feasting\"...
I see, I believe I understand now."
"Hmm, is that so? So humans desire not just physical objects, but more intangible concepts as well."
"Hmm, is that so? So humans desire not just physical objects, but more intangible concepts as well."
"Very well. If it will give you a moment of happiness... You may have my assistance, dear sister."
"Thank you for gathering this information. Learning about the feelings people associate with Christmas will be greatly beneficial to my work."
"I will prepare gifts that are not only unique, but which perfectly answer their wishes!"
"I will prepare gifts that are not only unique, but which perfectly answer their wishes!"
